IAS Awanish Sharan and Newstrack and Apn: in-chief Yohesh Mishra also shared the image, adding to its credibility.
The image was published by CNN Spanish i: providing a reliable source for its origin and context.
The man in the image: Moisés Reyes Sandoval, a law professor at Mexico’s Inter-American University for Development, confirmed the authenticity of the claim and explained the reason for carrying the baby during the lecture.
